definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
category/genus (taxonomy)/family members/dependents/to belong to/subordinate to/affiliated with/be born in the year of (one of the 12 animals)/to be/to prove to be/to constitute
to join together/to fix one's attention on/to concentrate on

sentences.english: Try to discourage such familiarities from your subordinates.
sentences.chinese: 不要讓下屬對你這樣不拘禮節。

sentences.english: In the perspective of subordinates, has also not condemning mouth, and you would like to smile out of him?
sentences.chinese: 在下屬的角度，已經罵不還口了，你還想他擠出笑容？

sentences.english: If you are the boss, DON'T date your subordinates.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是老闆，不要約會你的下屬。

sentences.english: EXAMPLE: The loyal manager always shouldered the blame for problems caused by any of his subordinates.
sentences.chinese: 這位忠厚的經理總是爲下屬造成的每個問題承擔責任。

sentences.english: He took with him several of his subordinates, and amongst them Dantès' jailer.
sentences.chinese: 他帶走了幾個下屬，看管唐太斯的獄卒也在其中。

sentences.english: A substantial part of your client base is the back office of the worldwide bank.
sentences.chinese: 你的一個人員下屬機構是世界銀行的後勤處。

sentences.english: He thrived on the adulation of his henchman.
sentences.chinese: 他靠下屬的奉承而發跡。

sentences.english: Angela was a fast subordinate of hers.
sentences.chinese: 安吉拉曾是她下屬中一個快嘴的人。

sentences.english: Subordinates are not optimistic about Wang Jingwei to sign the agreement.
sentences.chinese: 下屬不看好汪精衛要籤的協議。

sentences.english: When his subordinates picked him up, he couldn't speak, and he seemed to be paralyzed.
sentences.chinese: 下屬們把他扶起來後發現，他不能說話了。
華天之星是華天集團下屬的經濟型酒店的子品牌。

sentences.english: Haig tended not to seek guidance from subordinates.
sentences.chinese: 黑格不想向下屬們尋求指導。

sentences.english: Jundong Gallery is a department owned by Beijing Jundong Cultural Development Limited Corporation.
sentences.chinese: 君東書畫苑是北京君東文化發展有限公司下屬機構。

sentences.english: The Salbes company is a subsidiary of JiuDa Salt Group.
sentences.chinese: 索貝斯公司系久大集團下屬子公司。

sentences.english: It provides the ability to encapsulate the escalation process between subordinates and managers.
sentences.chinese: 它提供了封裝下屬和經理之間的升級流程的能力。
